Address.label: Address
Address.value: 864 SPRING STREET NW, ATLANTA, Georgia, 30308, United States

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: NCR Corp is a software- and services-led enterprise technology provider that runs stores, restaurants, and self-directed banking for its customers. Its software platform runs in the cloud and includes microservices and APIs that integrate with its customers' systems. Its segment comprises Payments & Network; Digital Banking; Self-Service Banking; Retail; and Hospitality.
